meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marion Baumgarten Galen Benshoof Jessamine Price Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6330.

td.p: Marion Baumgarten, a human resources evaluator from River Forest, Illinois
Galen Benshoof, a project manager in health care from Seattle, Washington
Jessamine Price, a graduate student in creative writing from Greenbelt, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,201)

tr.td: THE CHEROKEE NATION
'90s FILM QUOTES
GRAVE MATTERS
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
SALE
THE 7 "C"s

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Started as Adolph, went on to Arthur, and then the name under which you know him best and which is closely associated with the instrument he played and the one we\'re looking for.)
...
(Alex: The performer who started off as Adolph wound up as Harpo Marx, so the instrument we\'re going for is [*].)
MarionWhat is the clarinet?
$9,799
JessamineWhat is the cello?
$799
GalenWhat is the trumpet?
$6,201
the harp')
